text:
Geoblink | Madrid| Frontend Developer| Full-time | 40% Remote

We're a fast growing startup that already raised close to $8 million in investment from leading venture capital firms, and that was named by Bloomberg as one of 50 most promising startups in the world to look out for. Our goal is to revolutionise the world of Location Intelligence and the way businesses think about, and act upon location intelligence data.

If you would like to apply here is the link: https://geoblink.workable.com/jobs/765131

If you would like to find out more, feel free to email jobs@geoblink.com

Salary DOE but somewhere between 35K- 45K Euros
